about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of Wheelie City!

Get ready to dive into an action-packed metropolis, where you'll take control of the streets, pulling off daring stunts on your motorcycle, delivering packages, and customizing both your bike and character to stand out as the king or queen of deliveries.

  • Master the Maneuvers: Step into the world of bold maneuvers as you stunt your motorcycle through the bustling streets of the Wheelie City. Hone your stunt skills, defy gravity, and create a visual spectacle that will leave everyone in awe.

  • High-Impact Deliveries: Become the ultimate courier of the Wheelie City, facing thrilling delivery challenges. Navigate dynamic urban scenarios, dodge heavy traffic, explore secret shortcuts, and keep the adrenaline pumping as you deliver vital packages in record time.

  • Unique Customization: Personal expression is key in the Wheelie City. Customization isn't limited to just your bike; you can also shape your character's appearance. Choose from a wide range of customization options, from radical bike designs to stylish outfits and striking accessories to make your mark in the urban landscape.

  • Expansive World: Explore every corner of the Wheelie City as you traverse diverse neighborhoods, each with its own style and challenges.

Get ready for an intense delivery journey, where motorcycle finesse and stunt prowess come together to create an electrifying experience. In Wheelie City you're the star of the streets, and every curve, wheelie, and successful delivery takes you one step closer to glory on the urban roads. Are you ready to become the ultimate motorcycle delivery icon in the Wheelie City? Rev up and make history!

Welcome to the world of Wheelie City!

Get ready to dive into an action-packed metropolis, where you'll take control of the streets, pulling off daring stunts on your motorcycle, delivering packages, and customizing both your bike and character to stand out as the king or queen of deliveries.

Choose from a wide range of customization options, from radical bike designs to stylish outfits and striking accessories to make your mark in the urban landscape.

  • Expansive World: Explore every corner of the Wheelie City as you traverse diverse neighborhoods, each with its own style and challenges.

Get ready for an intense delivery journey, where motorcycle finesse and stunt prowess come together to create an electrifying experience. Are you ready to become the ultimate motorcycle delivery icon in the Wheelie City? Rev up and make history!
name: Wheelie City

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 7xxx
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

dejus.descriptors:
Drogas ilícitas
Conteúdo sexual
Atos criminosos

short_description: Wheelie City is a game about doing deliveries as fast as possible, climbing the urban ranks while collecting and customizing your bike to fit your style! Stunt your way accross hand crafted maps to find shortcuts and secrets and become the best delivery driver in the Wheelie City
